description: Garlic roast leg of lamb, golden potatoes and Greek salad - try this roast lamb recipe for a delicious Greek-inspired feast at home.
name: GreekStyle Roast Leg Of Lamb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 garlic cloves, crushed (save 8 unpeeled garlic cloves)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove leaves from half of the oregano and finely chop. Combine chopped oregano, zest, crushed garlic and 2 tbs oil in a small bowl. Season. Place lamb in a roasting pan. Rub oregano mixture all over lamb and set aside for 30 minutes.

Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Add potato to pan with lamb and drizzle with remaining oil. Roast for 1 hour or until lamb is browned and potato is almost tender. Add lemon wedges and extra garlic to pan. Roast for 30 minutes for medium or until lamb is cooked to your liking. Remove pan from oven, cover lamb loosely with foil and allow to rest for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare salad kits according to packet instructions.
Sprinkle remaining oregano over lamb. Serve with salad.
